'''Alan Tilvern''' ([[5 November|November 5]], [[1918]] - [[17 December|December 17]], [[2003]]) was an actor. He was the voice of the "Innkeeper" ([[Barliman Butterbur]]) in [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|1978 film ''The Lord of the Rings'']].
